name: Exped Comfort -5C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Enjoy camping without feeling confined while you sleep. Designed to be more spacious than your standard mummy bag, the Comfort series has room to move inside without sacrificing thermal effeciency. On cold mornings, the zippered armholes and footbox open up to be worn like a warm poncho while you make coffee.Tightly woven ripstop nylon shell has a Teflon EcoElite™ DWR treatment to shed moisture.Insulated with 700+ fill power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.Adjustable hood can be cinched down in the cold or opened up when it's warm.Zippered arm hole lets you free your arms without leaving the bag.BlanketZip footbox opens the end of the bag without opening the main zipper.YKK #5 zipper connects with other bags with the same zipper.Draft tube keeps heat in and cold out.Small internal pocket holds contact lenses or headlamp.Waterproof stuff sack and large storage sack included.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
